title: Can no longer access the email my account is tied to.
body:
I am in a bit if a pickle with my account. The email address my league account is tied to is no longer used by me and I can no longer access it.  I am wanting to update my account to my primary email I still use, but the user interface requires access to the old email. Can someone from support point me in the right direction on how this can be resolved?

Thanks.

replies.body:
Darn, that is quite the pickle to be in! No worries, we can certainly help you out if you [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us. One of our account specialists will get back to you as soon as possible so we can sort this out together. :)

Let me know if you have any questions.
